item.title: How to Sync Vscode Plugins Over Your Dotfiles
item.description: I was looking a simple way to get sync all of my current setup of vscode, I did’t found a proper way to do with another plugin, but I found a commands to do this sync. first to have a list of plugins installed and save to a file: code --list-extensions > vscode-extensions.list to restore, read that file and install all plugins: cat vscode-extensions.list | xargs -L 1 code --install-extension # using bat bat vscode-extensions.

item.title: My dotfiles
item.description: Yes, I finally setup my work environment to work across in my differents machines, I used this tools for that: Tmux Powerline fonts patched (I uploaded my fonts patched) Iterm2 (v3.3) NeoVim Oh-My-Zsh Spf13 vim configuration Check out my public repo in that I wrote how to install if you want reuse my config.
